title: 101 A's and counting (my type blog)
content:
As I suspect you all do, I take snapshots of type whereever I go.  
Some of them I post on my blog. I've tagged each one with what letters are on the photos, so you can browse by letter.

If you like, you can have a look at it here:  
 [http://www.madshougaard.dk/blog/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012192103/http:/www.madshougaard.dk/blog/)

or, you can find my collection on flickr:  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/madsrh/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012192103/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/madsrh/)
author: mads
